Flat Rate Offerings

  • Simple landing page - $50.00

    A 1 page website perfect for those needing a clean and elegant web presence.

  • Multipage site - $150.00

    Need something more complex? Have a variety of services or want to tell a more in depth story or display a portfolio? This option could be for you!

  • Multipage + CMS site - $500.00

    Looking for a blog or an ever increasing portfolio? This option provides the ability to keep adding to your site over time.
